22#ifdef swap
23 #undef swap

25template<class T>
26inline void swap(T &a, T &b)
27{
28 T t = a;
29 a = b;
30 b = t;
31}
32#ifdef max
33 #undef max
34#endif
35#ifdef min
36 #undef min

38template<class T>
39inline T max(T a, T b)
40{
41 return a > b ? a : b;
42}
43template<class T>
44inline T max(T a, T b, T c)
45{
46 return max(max(a, b), c);
47}
48template<class T>
49inline T min(T a, T b)
50{
51 return a < b ? a : b;
52}
53template<class T>
54inline T min(T a, T b, T c)
55{
56 return min(min(a, b), c);
57}

59#ifdef __GNUC__
60 #define BITSCAN(mask) (__builtin_ffs(mask)-1)
61#else
62 #ifdef WIN32
63 #pragma intrinsic(_BitScanForward)
64 inline int BITSCAN(uint mask)
65 {
66 ulong i;
67 return _BitScanForward(&i, mask) ? i : -1;
68 }
69 #else
70 inline int BITSCAN(uint mask)
71 {
72 if(!mask) return -1;
73 int i = 1;
74 if(!(mask&0xFFFF)) { i += 16; mask >>= 16; }
75 if(!(mask&0xFF)) { i += 8; mask >>= 8; }
76 if(!(mask&0xF)) { i += 4; mask >>= 4; }
77 if(!(mask&3)) { i += 2; mask >>= 2; }
78 return i - (mask&1);
79 }
80 #endif
81#endif

83inline int randomint(int x)
84{

87inline float randomfloat(int x)
88{
89 return (float((rand()*float(x))/float(RAND_MAX)));
90}
91//1103515245+12345 are magic constants for LCG psuedorandom generator
92inline float detrnd(uint s, int x)
93{
94 return static_cast<int>(((s*1103515245+12345)>>16)%x);
95}

142inline void vformatstring(char *d, const char *fmt, va_list v, int len) { _vsnprintf(d, len, fmt, v); d[len-1] = 0; }

144template<size_t N>
145inline void vformatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, va_list v) { vformatstring(d, fmt, v, N); }

147inline char *copystring(char *d, const char *s, size_t len)
148{
149 size_t slen = min(strlen(s), len-1);
150 memcpy(d, s, slen);
151 d[slen] = 0;
152 return d;
153}

155inline char *copystring(char (&d)[N], const char *s) { return copystring(d, s, N); }
156
157inline char *concatstring(char *d, const char *s, size_t len) { size_t used = strlen(d); return used < len ? copystring(d+used, s, len-used) : d; }

160inline char *concatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *s) { return concatstring(d, s, N); }

162inline void nformatstring(char *d, int len, const char *fmt, ...) PRINTFARGS(3, 4);
163inline void nformatstring(char *d, int len, const char *fmt, ...)
164{
165 va_list v;
166 va_start(v, fmt);
167 vformatstring(d, fmt, v, len);
168 va_end(v);

175inline void formatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, ...)
176{
177 va_list v;
178 va_start(v, fmt);
179 vformatstring(d, fmt, v, static_cast<int>(N));
180 va_end(v);
181}

186template<size_t N>
187inline void concformatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, ...)
188{
189 va_list v;
190 va_start(v, fmt);
191 int len = strlen(d);
192 vformatstring(d + len, fmt, v, static_cast<int>(N) - len);
193 va_end(v);
194}

201template<size_t N>
202inline bool matchstring(const char *s, size_t len, const char (&d)[N])
203{
204 return len == N-1 && !memcmp(s, d, N-1);
205}

207inline char *newstring(size_t l)
208{
209 return new char[l+1];
210}
211inline char *newstring(const char *s, size_t l)
212{
213 return copystring(newstring(l), s, l+1);
214}
215inline char *newstring(const char *s)
216{
217 size_t l = strlen(s);
218 char *d = newstring(l);
219 memcpy(d, s, l+1);
220 return d;
221}
222
223inline char *newconcatstring(const char *s, const char *t)
224{
225 size_t slen = strlen(s),
226 tlen = strlen(t);
227 char *r = newstring(slen + tlen);
228 memcpy(r, s, slen);
229 memcpy(&r[slen], t, tlen);
230 r[slen+tlen] = '\0';
231 return r;
232}

234template <class T>
235struct databuf
236{
237 enum
238 {
239 OVERREAD = 1<<0,
240 OVERWROTE = 1<<1
241 };
242
243 T *buf;
244 int len, maxlen;
245 uchar flags;
246
247 databuf() : buf(nullptr), len(0), maxlen(0), flags(0) {}
248
249 template<class U>
250 databuf(T *buf, U maxlen) : buf(buf), len(0), maxlen((int)maxlen), flags(0) {}
251
252 void reset()
253 {
254 len = 0;
255 flags = 0;
256 }
257
258 void reset(T *buf_, int maxlen_)
259 {
260 reset();
261 buf = buf_;
262 maxlen = maxlen_;
263 }
264
265 const T &get()
266 {
267 static const T overreadval = 0;
268 if(len<maxlen)
269 {
270 return buf[len++];
271 }
272 flags |= OVERREAD;
273 return overreadval;
274 }
275
276 databuf subbuf(int sz)
277 {
278 sz = std::clamp(sz, 0, maxlen-len);
279 len += sz;
280 return databuf(&buf[len-sz], sz);
281 }
282
283 T *pad(int numvals)
284 {
285 T *vals = &buf[len];
286 len += min(numvals, maxlen-len);
287 return vals;
288 }
289
290 void put(const T &val)
291 {
292 if(len<maxlen)
293 {
294 buf[len++] = val;
295 }
296 else
297 {
298 flags |= OVERWROTE;
299 }
300 }
301
302 void put(const T *vals, int numvals)
303 {
304 if(maxlen - len < numvals)
305 {
306 numvals = maxlen - len;
307 flags |= OVERWROTE;
308 }
309 memcpy(&buf[len], (const void *)vals, numvals*sizeof(T));
310 len += numvals;
311 }
312
313 int get(T *vals, int numvals)
314 {
315 if(maxlen - len < numvals)
316 {
317 numvals = maxlen - len;
318 flags |= OVERREAD;
319 }
320 memcpy(vals, (void *)&buf[len], numvals*sizeof(T));
321 len += numvals;
322 return numvals;
323 }
324
325 void offset(int n)
326 {
327 n = min(n, maxlen);
328 buf += n;
329 maxlen -= n;
330 len = max(len-n, 0);
331 }
332
333 T *getbuf() const { return buf; }
334 bool empty() const { return len==0; }
335 int length() const { return len; }
336 int remaining() const { return maxlen-len; }
337 bool overread() const { return (flags&OVERREAD)!=0; }
338 bool overwrote() const { return (flags&OVERWROTE)!=0; }
339
340 bool check(int n) { return remaining() >= n; }
341
342 void forceoverread()
343 {
344 len = maxlen;
345 flags |= OVERREAD;
346 }
347};

350typedef databuf<uchar> ucharbuf;

353inline float heapscore(const T &n) { return n; }

355struct sortless
356{
357 template<class T>
358 bool operator()(const T &x, const T &y) const { return x < y; }
359
360 bool operator()(char *x, char *y) const { return strcmp(x, y) < 0; }
361
362 bool operator()(const char *x, const char *y) const { return strcmp(x, y) < 0; }
363};
364
365struct sortnameless
366{
367 template<class T>
368 bool operator()(const T &x, const T &y) const { return sortless()(x.name, y.name); }
369
370 template<class T>
371 bool operator()(T *x, T *y) const { return sortless()(x->name, y->name); }
372
373 template<class T>
374 bool operator()(const T *x, const T *y) const { return sortless()(x->name, y->name); }
375};

377template<class T, class F>
378inline void insertionsort(T *start, T *end, F fun)
379{
380 for(T *i = start+1; i < end; i++)
381 {
382 if(fun(*i, i[-1]))
383 {
384 T tmp = *i;
385 *i = i[-1];
386 T *j = i-1;
387 for(; j > start && fun(tmp, j[-1]); --j)
388 {
389 *j = j[-1];
390 }
391 *j = tmp;
392 }
393 }
394
395}
396
397template<class T, class F>
398inline void insertionsort(T *buf, int n, F fun)
399{
400 insertionsort(buf, buf+n, fun);
401}
402
403template<class T>
404inline void insertionsort(T *buf, int n)
405{
406 insertionsort(buf, buf+n, sortless());
407}
408
409template<class T, class F>
410inline void quicksort(T *start, T *end, F fun)
411{
412 while(end-start > 10)
413 {
414 T *mid = &start[(end-start)/2], *i = start+1,
415 *j = end-2,
416 pivot;
417 if(fun(*start, *mid)) /* start < mid */
418 {
419 if(fun(end[-1], *start))
420 {
421 pivot = *start;
422 *start = end[-1];
423 end[-1] = *mid;
424 } /* end < start < mid */
425 else if(fun(end[-1], *mid))
426 {
427 pivot = end[-1];
428 end[-1] = *mid;
429 } /* start <= end < mid */
430 else
431 {
432 pivot = *mid;
433 } /* start < mid <= end */
434 }
435 else if(fun(*start, end[-1]))
436 {
437 pivot = *start;
438 *start = *mid;
439 } /*mid <= start < end */
440 else if(fun(*mid, end[-1]))
441 {
442 pivot = end[-1];
443 end[-1] = *start;
444 *start = *mid;
445 } /* mid < end <= start */
446 else
447 {
448 pivot = *mid;
449 swap(*start, end[-1]);
450 } /* end <= mid <= start */
451 *mid = end[-2];
452 do
453 {
454 while(fun(*i, pivot))
455 {
456 if(++i >= j)
457 {
458 goto partitioned;
459 }
460 }
461 while(fun(pivot, *--j))
462 {
463 if(i >= j)
464 {
465 goto partitioned;
466 }
467 }
468 swap(*i, *j);
469 } while(++i < j);
470 partitioned:
471 end[-2] = *i;
472 *i = pivot;
473
474 if(i-start < end-(i+1))
475 {
476 quicksort(start, i, fun);
477 start = i+1;
478 }
479 else
480 {
481 quicksort(i+1, end, fun);
482 end = i;
483 }
484 }
485
486 insertionsort(start, end, fun);
487}
488
489template<class T, class F>
490inline void quicksort(T *buf, int n, F fun)
491{
492 quicksort(buf, buf+n, fun);
493}
494
495template<class T>
496inline void quicksort(T *buf, int n)
497{
498 quicksort(buf, buf+n, sortless());
499}

501template<class T>
502struct isclass
503{
504 template<class C>
505 static char test(void (C::*)(void));
506
507 template<class C>
508 static int test(...);
509 enum
510 {
511 yes = sizeof(test<T>(0)) == 1 ? 1 : 0,
512 no = yes^1
513 };
514};
515
516inline uint hthash(const char *key)
517{
518 uint h = 5381;
519 for(int i = 0, k; (k = key[i]); i++)
520 {
521 h = ((h<<5)+h)^k; // bernstein k=33 xor
522 }
523 return h;
524}
525
526inline bool htcmp(const char *x, const char *y)
527{
528 return !strcmp(x, y);
529}

531struct stringslice
532{
533 const char *str;
534 int len;
535 stringslice() {}
536 stringslice(const char *str, int len) : str(str), len(len) {}
537 stringslice(const char *str, const char *end) : str(str), len(static_cast<int>(end-str)) {}
538
539 const char *end() const { return &str[len]; }
540};
541
542inline char *newstring(const stringslice &s) { return newstring(s.str, s.len); }
543inline const char *stringptr(const char *s) { return s; }
544inline const char *stringptr(const stringslice &s) { return s.str; }
545inline int stringlen(const char *s) { return static_cast<int>(strlen(s)); }
546inline int stringlen(const stringslice &s) { return s.len; }
547
548inline char *copystring(char *d, const stringslice &s, size_t len)
549{
550 size_t slen = min(size_t(s.len), len-1);
551 memcpy(d, s.str, slen);
552 d[slen] = 0;
553 return d;
554}

556template<size_t N>
557inline char *copystring(char (&d)[N], const stringslice &s) { return copystring(d, s, N); }
558
559inline uint memhash(const void *ptr, int len)
560{
561 const uchar *data = (const uchar *)ptr;
562 uint h = 5381;
563 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(len); ++i)
564 {
565 h = ((h<<5)+h)^data[i];
566 }
567 return h;
568}
569
570inline uint hthash(const stringslice &s) { return memhash(s.str, s.len); }
571
572inline bool htcmp(const stringslice &x, const char *y)
573{
574 return x.len == (int)strlen(y) && !memcmp(x.str, y, x.len);
575}

579 return key;

583{
584 return x==y;
585}

609template <class T>
610struct vector
611{
612 static const int MINSIZE = 8;
614 T *buf;
615 int alen,
616 ulen;
624 vector() : buf(nullptr), alen(0), ulen(0)
625 {
626 }
627
636 vector(const vector &v) : buf(nullptr), alen(0), ulen(0)
637 {
638 *this = v;
639 }
640
647 ~vector() { shrink(0); if(buf) delete[] (uchar *)buf; }
648
660 vector<T> &operator=(const vector<T> &v)
661 {
662 shrink(0);
663 if(v.length() > alen)
664 {
665 growbuf(v.length());
666 }
667 for(int i = 0; i < v.length(); i++)
668 {
669 add(v[i]);
670 }
671 return *this;
672 }
673
691 T &add(const T &x)
692 {
693 if(ulen==alen)
694 {
695 growbuf(ulen+1);
696 }
697 new (&buf[ulen]) T(x);
698 return buf[ulen++];
699 }
700
717 T &add()
718 {
719 if(ulen==alen)
720 {
721 growbuf(ulen+1);
722 }
723 new (&buf[ulen]) T;
724 return buf[ulen++];
725 }
726
736 T &dup()
737 {
738 if(ulen==alen)
739 {
740 growbuf(ulen+1);
741 }
742 new (&buf[ulen]) T(buf[ulen-1]);
743 return buf[ulen++];
744 }
745
754 void move(vector<T> &v)
755 {
756 if(!ulen)
757 {
758 swap(buf, v.buf);
759 swap(ulen, v.ulen);
760 swap(alen, v.alen);
761 }
762 else
763 {
764 growbuf(ulen+v.ulen);
765 if(v.ulen)
766 {
767 memcpy(&buf[ulen], (void *)v.buf, v.ulen*sizeof(T));
768 }
769 ulen += v.ulen;
770 v.ulen = 0;
771 }
772 }
773
787 bool inrange(size_t i) const { return i<size_t(ulen); }
788
802 bool inrange(int i) const { return i>=0 && i<ulen; }
803
812 T &pop() { return buf[--ulen]; }
813
821 T &last() { return buf[ulen-1]; }
822
832 void drop() { ulen--; buf[ulen].~T(); }
833
845 bool empty() const { return ulen==0; }
846
858 int capacity() const { return alen; }
859
868 int length() const { return ulen; }
869
880 T &operator[](int i) { return buf[i]; }
881
892 const T &operator[](int i) const { return buf[i]; }
893
904 T *disown() { T *r = buf; buf = nullptr; alen = ulen = 0; return r; }
905
914 void shrink(int i)
915 {
916 if(isclass<T>::no)
917 {
918 ulen = i;
919 }
920 else
921 {
922 while(ulen>i)
923 {
924 drop();
925 }
926 }
927 }
928
935 void setsize(int i) { ulen = i; }
936
946 void deletecontents(int n = 0)
947 {
948 while(ulen > n)
949 {
950 delete pop();
951 }
952 }
953
963 void deletearrays(int n = 0)
964 {
965 while(ulen > n)
966 {
967 delete[] pop();
968 }
969 }
970
979 T *getbuf() { return buf; }
980
990 const T *getbuf() const { return buf; }
991
1004 bool inbuf(const T *e) const { return e >= buf && e < &buf[ulen]; }
1005
1017 template<class F>
1018 void sort(F fun, int i = 0, int n = -1)
1019 {
1020 quicksort(&buf[i], n < 0 ? ulen-i : n, fun);
1021 }
1022
1033 void sort() { sort(sortless()); }
1034
1047 void sortname() { sort(sortnameless()); }
1048
1058 void growbuf(int sz)
1059 {
1060 int olen = alen;
1061 if(alen <= 0)
1062 {
1063 alen = max(MINSIZE, sz);
1064 }
1065 else
1066 {
1067 while(alen < sz)
1068 {
1069 alen += alen/2;
1070 }
1071 }
1072 if(alen <= olen)
1073 {
1074 return;
1075 }
1076 uchar *newbuf = new uchar[alen*sizeof(T)];
1077 if(olen > 0)
1078 {
1079 if(ulen > 0)
1080 {
1081 memcpy(newbuf, (void *)buf, ulen*sizeof(T));
1082 }
1083 delete[] (uchar *)buf;
1084 }
1085 buf = (T *)newbuf;
1086 }
1087
1097 databuf<T> reserve(int sz)
1098 {
1099 if(alen-ulen < sz)
1100 {
1101 growbuf(ulen+sz);
1102 }
1103 return databuf<T>(&buf[ulen], sz);
1104 }
1105
1111 void advance(int sz)
1112 {
1113 ulen += sz;
1114 }
1115
1121 void addbuf(const databuf<T> &p)
1122 {
1123 advance(p.length());
1124 }
1125
1134 T *pad(int n)
1135 {
1136 T *buf = reserve(n).buf;
1137 advance(n);
1138 return buf;
1139 }
1140
1150 void put(const T &v) { add(v); }
1151
1158 void put(const T *v, int n)
1159 {
1160 databuf<T> buf = reserve(n);
1161 buf.put(v, n);
1162 addbuf(buf);
1163 }
1164
1175 void remove(int i, int n)
1176 {
1177 for(int p = i+n; p<ulen; p++)
1178 {
1179 buf[p-n] = buf[p];
1180 }
1181 ulen -= n;
1182 }
1183
1199 T remove(int i)
1200 {
1201 T e = buf[i];
1202 for(int p = i+1; p<ulen; p++)
1203 {
1204 buf[p-1] = buf[p];
1205 }
1206 ulen--;
1207 return e;
1208 }
1209
1221 T removeunordered(int i)
1222 {
1223 T e = buf[i];
1224 ulen--;
1225 if(ulen>0)
1226 {
1227 buf[i] = buf[ulen];
1228 }
1229 return e;
1230 }
1231
1242 template<class U>
1243 int find(const U &o)
1244 {
1245 for(int i = 0; i < ulen; ++i)
1246 {
1247 if(buf[i]==o)
1248 {
1249 return i;
1250 }
1251 }
1252 return -1;
1253 }
1254
1264 void addunique(const T &o)
1265 {
1266 if(find(o) < 0)
1267 {
1268 add(o);
1269 }
1270 }
1271
1281 void removeobj(const T &o)
1282 {
1283 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(ulen); ++i)
1284 {
1285 if(buf[i] == o)
1286 {
1287 int dst = i;
1288 for(int j = i+1; j < ulen; j++)
1289 {
1290 if(!(buf[j] == o))
1291 {
1292 buf[dst++] = buf[j];
1293 }
1294 }
1295 setsize(dst);
1296 break;
1297 }
1298 }
1299 }
1300
1314 void replacewithlast(const T &o)
1315 {
1316 if(!ulen) //do not operate on empty vector
1317 {
1318 return;
1319 }
1320 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(ulen-1); ++i) //loop through
1321 {
1322 if(buf[i]==o) //compare to passed item
1323 {
1324 buf[i] = buf[ulen-1]; //move last element
1325 break;
1326 }
1327 ulen--; //move index down one
1328 }
1329 }
1330
1344 T &insert(int i, const T &e)
1345 {
1346 add(T()); //add to end of vector
1347 for(int p = ulen-1; p>i; p--) //from end to index, shift elements forwards one
1348 {
1349 buf[p] = buf[p-1];
1350 }
1351 buf[i] = e; //insert at ith location in buffer
1352 return buf[i]; //return the value assigned
1353 }
1354
1367 T *insert(int i, const T *e, int n)
1368 {
1369 if(alen-ulen < n) //expand buffer if needed
1370 {
1371 growbuf(ulen+n);
1372 }
1373 for(int j = 0; j < n; ++j) //add n elements to end
1374 {
1375 add(T());
1376 }
1377 for(int p = ulen-1; p>=i+n; p--) //for descending elements after i+n (new elements) move upwards by n
1378 {
1379 buf[p] = buf[p-n];
1380 }
1381 for(int j = 0; j < n; ++j) //set value of n elements to e
1382 {
1383 buf[i+j] = e[j];
1384 }
1385 return &buf[i]; //return first newly allocated
1386 }
1387
1394 void reverse()
1395 {
1396 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(ulen/2); ++i)
1397 {
1398 swap(buf[i], buf[ulen-1-i]);
1399 }
1400 }
1401
1410 static int heapparent(int i) { return (i - 1) >> 1; }
1411
1422 static int heapchild(int i) { return (i << 1) + 1; }
1423
1427 void buildheap()
1428 {
1429 for(int i = ulen/2; i >= 0; i--) downheap(i);
1430 }
1431
1442 int upheap(int i)
1443 {
1444 float score = heapscore(buf[i]);
1445 while(i > 0)
1446 {
1447 int pi = heapparent(i);
1448 if(score >= heapscore(buf[pi]))
1449 {
1450 break;
1451 }
1452 swap(buf[i], buf[pi]);
1453 i = pi;
1454 }
1455 return i;
1456 }
1457
1466 T &addheap(const T &x)
1467 {
1468 add(x);
1469 return buf[upheap(ulen-1)];
1470 }
1471
1481 int downheap(int i)
1482 {
1483 float score = heapscore(buf[i]);
1484 for(;;)
1485 {
1486 int ci = heapchild(i);
1487 if(ci >= ulen)
1488 {
1489 break;
1490 }
1491 float cscore = heapscore(buf[ci]);
1492 if(score > cscore)
1493 {
1494 if(ci+1 < ulen && heapscore(buf[ci+1]) < cscore)
1495 {
1496 swap(buf[ci+1], buf[i]); i = ci+1;
1497 }
1498 else
1499 {
1500 swap(buf[ci], buf[i]); i = ci;
1501 }
1502 }
1503 else if(ci+1 < ulen && heapscore(buf[ci+1]) < score)
1504 {
1505 swap(buf[ci+1], buf[i]); i = ci+1;
1506 }
1507 else break;
1508 }
1509 return i;
1510 }
1511
1520 T removeheap()
1521 {
1522 T e = removeunordered(0);
1523 if(ulen)
1524 {
1525 downheap(0);
1526 }
1527 return e;
1528 }
1529
1543 template<class K>
1544 int htfind(const K &key)
1545 {
1546 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(ulen); ++i)
1547 {
1548 if(htcmp(key, buf[i]))
1549 {
1550 return i;
1551 }
1552 }
1553 return -1;
1554 }
1555
1556 #define UNIQUE(overwrite, cleanup) \
1557 for(int i = 1; i < ulen; i++) \
1558 if(htcmp(buf[i-1], buf[i])) \
1559 { \
1560 int n = i; \
1561 while(++i < ulen) \
1562 { \
1563 if(!htcmp(buf[n-1], buf[i])) \
1564 { \
1565 overwrite; \
1566 n++; \
1567 } \
1568 } \
1569 cleanup; \
1570 break; \
1571 }
1572
1583 void unique() // contents must be initially sorted
1584 {
1585 UNIQUE(buf[n] = buf[i], setsize(n));
1586 }
1587
1595 void uniquedeletecontents()
1596 {
1597 UNIQUE(swap(buf[n], buf[i]), deletecontents(n));
1598 }
1599
1607 void uniquedeletearrays()
1608 {
1609 UNIQUE(swap(buf[n], buf[i]), deletearrays(n));
1610 }
1611 #undef UNIQUE
1612};
1613
1614template<class H, class E, class K, class T>
1615struct hashbase
1616{
1617 typedef E elemtype;
1618 typedef K keytype;
1619 typedef T datatype;
1620
1621 enum { CHUNKSIZE = 64 };
1622
1623 struct chain { E elem; chain *next; };
1624 struct chainchunk { chain chains[CHUNKSIZE]; chainchunk *next; };
1625
1626 int size;
1627 int numelems;
1628 chain **chains;
1629
1630 chainchunk *chunks;
1631 chain *unused;
1632
1633 enum { DEFAULTSIZE = 1<<10 };
1634
1635 hashbase(int size = DEFAULTSIZE)
1636 : size(size)
1637 {
1638 numelems = 0;
1639 chunks = nullptr;
1640 unused = nullptr;
1641 chains = new chain *[size];
1642 memset(chains, 0, size*sizeof(chain *));
1643 }
1644
1645 ~hashbase()
1646 {
1647 DELETEA(chains);
1648 deletechunks();
1649 }
1650
1651 chain *insert(uint h)
1652 {
1653 if(!unused)
1654 {
1655 chainchunk *chunk = new chainchunk;
1656 chunk->next = chunks;
1657 chunks = chunk;
1658 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(CHUNKSIZE-1); ++i)
1659 {
1660 chunk->chains[i].next = &chunk->chains[i+1];
1661 }
1662 chunk->chains[CHUNKSIZE-1].next = unused;
1663 unused = chunk->chains;
1664 }
1665 chain *c = unused;
1666 unused = unused->next;
1667 c->next = chains[h];
1668 chains[h] = c;
1669 numelems++;
1670 return c;
1671 }
1672
1673 template<class U>
1674 T &insert(uint h, const U &key)
1675 {
1676 chain *c = insert(h);
1677 H::setkey(c->elem, key);
1678 return H::getdata(c->elem);
1679 }
1680
1681 #define HTFIND(success, fail) \
1682 uint h = hthash(key)&(this->size-1); \
1683 for(chain *c = this->chains[h]; c; c = c->next) \
1684 { \
1685 if(htcmp(key, H::getkey(c->elem))) \
1686 { \
1687 return success H::getdata(c->elem); \
1688 } \
1689 } \
1690 return (fail);
1691
1692 template<class U>
1693 T *access(const U &key)
1694 {
1695 HTFIND(&, nullptr);
1696 }
1697
1698 template<class U, class V>
1699 T &access(const U &key, const V &elem)
1700 {
1701 HTFIND( , insert(h, key) = elem);
1702 }
1703
1704 template<class U>
1705 T &operator[](const U &key)
1706 {
1707 HTFIND( , insert(h, key));
1708 }
1709
1710 template<class U>
1711 T &find(const U &key, T &notfound)
1712 {
1713 HTFIND( , notfound);
1714 }
1715
1716 template<class U>
1717 const T &find(const U &key, const T &notfound)
1718 {
1719 HTFIND( , notfound);
1720 }
1721
1722 template<class U>
1723 bool remove(const U &key)
1724 {
1725 uint h = hthash(key)&(size-1);
1726 for(chain **p = &chains[h], *c = chains[h]; c; p = &c->next, c = c->next)
1727 {
1728 if(htcmp(key, H::getkey(c->elem)))
1729 {
1730 *p = c->next;
1731 c->elem.~E();
1732 new (&c->elem) E;
1733 c->next = unused;
1734 unused = c;
1735 numelems--;
1736 return true;
1737 }
1738 }
1739 return false;
1740 }
1741
1742 void recycle()
1743 {
1744 if(!numelems)
1745 {
1746 return;
1747 }
1748 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(size); ++i)
1749 {
1750 chain *c = chains[i];
1751 if(!c)
1752 {
1753 continue;
1754 }
1755 for(;;)
1756 {
1757 htrecycle(c->elem);
1758 if(!c->next)
1759 {
1760 break;
1761 }
1762 c = c->next;
1763 }
1764 c->next = unused;
1765 unused = chains[i];
1766 chains[i] = nullptr;
1767 }
1768 numelems = 0;
1769 }
1770
1771 void deletechunks()
1772 {
1773 for(chainchunk *nextchunk; chunks; chunks = nextchunk)
1774 {
1775 nextchunk = chunks->next;
1776 delete chunks;
1777 }
1778 }
1779
1780 void clear()
1781 {
1782 if(!numelems)
1783 {
1784 return;
1785 }
1786 memset(chains, 0, size*sizeof(chain *));
1787 numelems = 0;
1788 unused = nullptr;
1789 deletechunks();
1790 }
1791
1792 static inline chain *enumnext(void *i) { return ((chain *)i)->next; }
1793 static inline K &enumkey(void *i) { return H::getkey(((chain *)i)->elem); }
1794 static inline T &enumdata(void *i) { return H::getdata(((chain *)i)->elem); }
1795};
1796
1797template<class T>
1798inline void htrecycle(const T &) {}
1799
1800template<class T>
1801struct hashset : hashbase<hashset<T>, T, T, T>
1802{
1803 typedef hashbase<hashset<T>, T, T, T> basetype;
1804
1805 hashset(int size = basetype::DEFAULTSIZE) : basetype(size) {}
1806
1807 static inline const T &getkey(const T &elem) { return elem; }
1808 static inline T &getdata(T &elem) { return elem; }
1809 template<class K>
1810 static inline void setkey(T &, const K &) {}
1811
1812 template<class V>
1813 T &add(const V &elem)
1814 {
1815 return basetype::access(elem, elem);
1816 }
1817};
1818
1819template<class T>
1820struct hashnameset : hashbase<hashnameset<T>, T, const char *, T>
1821{
1822 typedef hashbase<hashnameset<T>, T, const char *, T> basetype;
1823
1824 hashnameset(int size = basetype::DEFAULTSIZE) : basetype(size) {}
1825
1826 template<class U>
1827 static inline const char *getkey(const U &elem) { return elem.name; }
1828
1829 template<class U>
1830 static inline const char *getkey(U *elem) { return elem->name; }
1831
1832 static inline T &getdata(T &elem) { return elem; }
1833
1834 template<class K>
1835 static inline void setkey(T &, const K &) {}
1836
1837 template<class V>
1838 T &add(const V &elem)
1839 {
1840 return basetype::access(getkey(elem), elem);
1841 }
1842};
1843
1844template<class K, class T>
1845struct hashtableentry
1846{
1847 K key;
1848 T data;
1849};
1850
1851template<class K, class T>
1852inline void htrecycle(hashtableentry<K, T> &entry)
1853{
1854 htrecycle(entry.key);
1855 htrecycle(entry.data);
1856}
1857
1858template<class K, class T>
1859struct hashtable : hashbase<hashtable<K, T>, hashtableentry<K, T>, K, T>
1860{
1861 typedef hashbase<hashtable<K, T>, hashtableentry<K, T>, K, T> basetype;
1862 typedef typename basetype::elemtype elemtype;
1863
1864 hashtable(int size = basetype::DEFAULTSIZE) : basetype(size) {}
1865
1866 static inline K &getkey(elemtype &elem) { return elem.key; }
1867 static inline T &getdata(elemtype &elem) { return elem.data; }
1868
1869 template<class U>
1870 static inline void setkey(elemtype &elem, const U &key) { elem.key = key; }
1871};
1872
1873//ht stands for a hash table
1874#define ENUMERATE_KT(ht,k,e,t,f,b) \
1875 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>((ht).size); ++i) \
1876 { \
1877 for(void *ec = (ht).chains[i]; ec;) \
1878 { \
1879 k &e = (ht).enumkey(ec); \
1880 t &f = (ht).enumdata(ec); \
1881 ec = (ht).enumnext(ec); \
1882 b; \
1883 } \
1884 }
1885#define ENUMERATE(ht,t,e,b) \
1886 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>((ht).size); ++i) \
1887 { \
1888 for(void *ec = (ht).chains[i]; ec;) \
1889 { \
1890 t &e = (ht).enumdata(ec); \
1891 ec = (ht).enumnext(ec); \
1892 b; \
1893 } \
1894 }
1895
1896template <class T, int SIZE>
1897struct queue
1898{
1899 int head, tail, len;
1900 T data[SIZE];
1901
1902 queue() { clear(); }
1903
1904 void clear() { head = tail = len = 0; }
1905
1906 int length() const { return len; }
1907 bool empty() const { return !len; }
1908 bool full() const { return len == SIZE; }
1909
1910 bool inrange(size_t i) const { return i<size_t(len); }
1911 bool inrange(int i) const { return i>=0 && i<len; }
1912
1913 T &added() { return data[tail > 0 ? tail-1 : SIZE-1]; }
1914 T &added(int offset) { return data[tail-offset > 0 ? tail-offset-1 : tail-offset-1 + SIZE]; }
1915 T &adding() { return data[tail]; }
1916 T &adding(int offset) { return data[tail+offset >= SIZE ? tail+offset - SIZE : tail+offset]; }
1917 T &add()
1918 {
1919 T &t = data[tail];
1920 tail++;
1921 if(tail >= SIZE) tail -= SIZE;
1922 if(len < SIZE) len++;
1923 return t;
1924 }
1925 T &add(const T &e) { return add() = e; }
1926
1927 T &pop()
1928 {
1929 tail--;
1930 if(tail < 0)
1931 {
1932 tail += SIZE;
1933 }
1934 len--;
1935 return data[tail];
1936 }
1937
1938 T &removing() { return data[head]; }
1939 T &removing(int offset) { return data[head+offset >= SIZE ? head+offset - SIZE : head+offset]; }
1940 T &remove()
1941 {
1942 T &t = data[head];
1943 head++;
1944 if(head >= SIZE)
1945 {
1946 head -= SIZE;
1947 }
1948 len--;
1949 return t;
1950 }
1951
1952 T &operator[](int offset) { return removing(offset); }
1953 const T &operator[](int offset) const { return removing(offset); }
1954};
1955
1956template <class T, int SIZE>
1957struct reversequeue : queue<T, SIZE>
1958{
1959 T &operator[](int offset) { return queue<T, SIZE>::added(offset); }
1960 const T &operator[](int offset) const { return queue<T, SIZE>::added(offset); }
1961};
1962
1963#ifdef SDL_BYTEORDER
1964 #define endianswap16 SDL_Swap16
1965 #define endianswap32 SDL_Swap32
1966 #define endianswap64 SDL_Swap64
1967#else
1968inline ushort endianswap16(ushort n) { return (n<<8) | (n>>8); }
1969inline uint endianswap32(uint n) { return (n<<24) | (n>>24) | ((n>>8)&0xFF00) | ((n<<8)&0xFF0000); }
1970inline ullong endianswap64(ullong n) { return endianswap32(static_cast<uint>(n >> 32)) | ((ullong)endianswap32(static_cast<uint>(n)) << 32); }
1971#endif
1972
1973template<class T>
1974inline T endianswap(T n) { union { T t; uint i; } conv; conv.t = n; conv.i = SDL_Swap32(conv.i); return conv.t; }
1975
1976template<>
1977inline uint endianswap<uint>(uint n) { return endianswap32(n); }
1978
1979template<>
1980inline int endianswap<int>(int n) { return endianswap32(n); }
1981
1982/* workaround for some C platforms that have these two functions as macros - not used anywhere */
1983#ifdef getchar
1984 #undef getchar
1985#endif
1986#ifdef putchar
1987 #undef putchar
1988#endif
1989
1990struct stream
1991{
1992#ifdef WIN32
1993 #if defined(__GNUC__) && !defined(__MINGW32__)
1994 typedef off64_t offset;
1995 #else
1996 typedef __int64 offset;
1997 #endif
1998 #else
1999 typedef off_t offset;
2000#endif
2001 //see file/gz/utf8/zipstream children for more interesting forms
2002 virtual ~stream() {}
2003 virtual void close() = 0;
2004 virtual bool end() = 0;
2005 virtual offset tell() { return -1; }
2006 virtual offset rawtell() { return tell(); }
2007 virtual bool seek(offset, int) { return false; }
2008 virtual offset size();
2009 virtual offset rawsize() { return size(); }
2010 virtual size_t read(void *, size_t) { return 0; }
2011 virtual size_t write(const void *, size_t) { return 0; }
2012 virtual bool flush() { return true; }
2013 virtual int getchar() { uchar c; return read(&c, 1) == 1 ? c : -1; }
2014 virtual bool putchar(int n) { uchar c = n; return write(&c, 1) == 1; }
2015 virtual bool getline(char *str, size_t len);
2016 virtual bool putstring(const char *str) { size_t len = strlen(str); return write(str, len) == len; }
2017 virtual bool putline(const char *str) { return putstring(str) && putchar('\n'); }
2018 virtual size_t printf(const char *fmt, ...) PRINTFARGS(2, 3);
2019 virtual uint getcrc() { return 0; }
2020
2021 template<class T>
2022 size_t put(const T *v, size_t n) { return write(v, n*sizeof(T))/sizeof(T); }
2023
2024 template<class T>
2025 bool put(T n) { return write(&n, sizeof(n)) == sizeof(n); }
2026
2027 template<class T>
2028 size_t get(T *v, size_t n) { return read(v, n*sizeof(T))/sizeof(T); }
2029
2030 template<class T>
2031 T get() { T n; return read(&n, sizeof(n)) == sizeof(n) ? n : 0; }
2032
2033 template<class T>
2034 bool putbig(T n) { return put<T>(endianswap(n)); }
2035
2036
2037SDL_RWops *rwops();
2038
2039};

2041template<class T>
2042struct streambuf
2043{
2044 stream *s;
2045
2046 streambuf(stream *s) : s(s) {}
2047
2048 T get() { return s->get<T>(); }
2049 size_t get(T *vals, size_t numvals) { return s->get(vals, numvals); }
2050 void put(const T &val) { s->put(&val, 1); }
2051 void put(const T *vals, size_t numvals) { s->put(vals, numvals); }
2052 size_t length() { return s->size(); }
2053};

2055enum
2056{
2057 CubeType_Print = 1 << 0,
2058 CubeType_Space = 1 << 1,
2059 CubeType_Digit = 1 << 2,
2060 CubeType_Alpha = 1 << 3,
2061 CubeType_Lower = 1 << 4,
2062 CubeType_Upper = 1 << 5,
2063 CubeType_Unicode = 1 << 6
2064};
2065extern const uchar cubectype[256];
2066inline int iscubeprint(uchar c) { return cubectype[c] & CubeType_Print; }
2067inline int iscubespace(uchar c) { return cubectype[c] & CubeType_Space; }
2068inline int iscubealpha(uchar c) { return cubectype[c] & CubeType_Alpha; }
2069inline int iscubealnum(uchar c) { return cubectype[c]&(CubeType_Alpha | CubeType_Digit); }
2070inline int iscubelower(uchar c) { return cubectype[c] & CubeType_Lower; }
2071inline int iscubeupper(uchar c) { return cubectype[c] & CubeType_Upper; }
2072inline int iscubepunct(uchar c) { return cubectype[c] == CubeType_Print; }
2073inline int cube2uni(uchar c)
2074{
2075 extern const int cube2unichars[256];
2076 return cube2unichars[c];
2077}
2078inline uchar uni2cube(int c)
2079{
2080 extern const int uni2cubeoffsets[8];
2081 extern const uchar uni2cubechars[];
2082 return static_cast<uint>(c) <= 0x7FF ? uni2cubechars[uni2cubeoffsets[c>>8] + (c&0xFF)] : 0;
2083}

2085{
2086 extern const uchar cubelowerchars[256];
2087 return cubelowerchars[c];
2088}
2089inline uchar cubeupper(uchar c)
2090{
2091 extern const uchar cubeupperchars[256];
2092 return cubeupperchars[c];
2093}

2122template<class T>
2123inline void putint_(T &p, int n)
2124{
2125 if(n<128 && n>-127)
2126 {
2127 p.put(n);
2128 }
2129 else if(n<0x8000 && n>=-0x8000)
2130 {
2131 p.put(0x80);
2132 p.put(n);
2133 p.put(n>>8);
2134 }
2135 else
2136 {
2137 p.put(0x81);
2138 p.put(n);
2139 p.put(n>>8);
2140 p.put(n>>16);
2141 p.put(n>>24);
2142 }
2143}
2144
2145template<class T>
2146inline void putuint_(T &p, int n)
2147{
2148 if(n < 0 || n >= (1<<21))
2149 {
2150 p.put(0x80 | (n & 0x7F));
2151 p.put(0x80 | ((n >> 7) & 0x7F));
2152 p.put(0x80 | ((n >> 14) & 0x7F));
2153 p.put(n >> 21);
2154 }
2155 else if(n < (1<<7))
2156 {
2157 p.put(n);
2158 }
2159 else if(n < (1<<14))
2160 {
2161 p.put(0x80 | (n & 0x7F));
2162 p.put(n >> 7);
2163 }
2164 else
2165 {
2166 p.put(0x80 | (n & 0x7F));
2167 p.put(0x80 | ((n >> 7) & 0x7F));
2168 p.put(n >> 14);
2169 }
2170}
2171
2172
2173template<class T>
2174inline void sendstring_(const char *t, T &p)
2175{
2176 while(*t)
2177 {
2178 putint(p, *t++);
2179 }
2180 putint(p, 0);
2181}
2182
2183template<class T>
2184inline void putfloat_(T &p, float f)
2185{
2186 p.put((uchar *)&f, sizeof(float));
2187}
